title: The Celestial Bonsai of the Cloud Peaks
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed digital illustration, Fantasy Xianxia style, 9:16 aspect ratio, vertical orientation. A breathtaking view through a large, circular traditional wooden window frame. Centered on an ancient, majestic bonsai tree with glowing light effects on the leaves and a gnarled, twisting trunk, planted in a decorative porcelain pot. Mystical water flow/qi energy cascades from the pot roots onto the shelf. The bonsai rests on an intricately carved wooden floating shelf, surrounded by soft, ethereal clouds. Next to the pot are rolled-up ancient scrolls tied with silk ribbons, a small dragon statue, and a steaming silver teapot set. In the distance, the view reveals a serene Xianxia landscape: floating mountain islands, elegant Wuxia-style pagodas and temples built into the misty cliffs, arched stone bridges, and white cranes flying in the soft pastel morning sky. Ethereal lighting, soft mist, deep depth of field.
negativePrompt: low quality, worst quality, poor anatomy, blurry, jpeg artifacts, ugly, deformed, noisy, signature, watermark, extra limbs, incomplete, mismatched elements, modern text, distorted perspective, monochrome, realistic photo.
